title: 服务器经常自动踢人怎么破
author: jie121ed
txt_content: 不是每个人都踢，但是有大部分人进服务器，服务器都会提示”Kicking Player *** because his account is limited”。ps：***是玩家名字。怎么回事啊，好急

replies.author: jie121ed
replies.txt_content:
643641307 发表于 2016-10-3 09:15
同上，我服务器也这样
知道是什么原因吗

jie121ed 发表于 2016-10-3 09:46
知道是什么原因吗
我解决了

replies.author: Quick_Reborn
replies.txt_content:
是rocket的问题
打开服务器的Rocket.Unturned.config.xml

设置如下
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<UnturnedSettings xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <RocketModObservatory CommunityBans="true" KickLimitedAccounts="false" KickTooYoungAccounts="false" MinimumAge="604800" />
  <AutomaticSave Enabled="true" Interval="1200" />
  <CharacterNameValidation>true</CharacterNameValidation>
  <CharacterNameValidationRule>([\x00-\xAA]|[\w_\ \.\+\-])+</CharacterNameValidationRule>
  <LogSuspiciousPlayerMovement>true</LogSuspiciousPlayerMovement>
</UnturnedSettings>
